title: The Office for Lost Objects
content:
hi all,

I wanted share with you a project I've put quite a bit of effort into, especially lately. I've got my furniture design studio, The Office for Lost Objects™, featured on Kickstarter.com, a crowdfunding site for creatives.

As part of the Kickstarter initiative, I commissioned some artwork which resulted in a limited edition series of four posters. They're archival quality Giclee prints (20"x30") on heavyweight 100% cotton Somerset Velvet (images below). They're available now, along with a few other items, only through Kickstarter.

[The Office for Lost Ojbects™ x Kickstarter](http://web.archive.org/web/20100116122547/http:/tiny.cc/olo)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100116122547im_/http:/typophile.com/files/OLO_Candy_01_TP_6628.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100116122547im_/http:/typophile.com/files/OLO_Candy_02_TP_6487.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100116122547im_/http:/typophile.com/files/OLO_Candy_03_TP_4285.jpg)

I hope you will take a look, and consider supporting me.

thanks!  
Jarrod
author: begsini
